00024 #ifndef _SERIALIZER_MZXML_HPP_
00025 #define _SERIALIZER_MZXML_HPP_
00026 
00027 #include "MSData.hpp"
00028 #include "BinaryDataEncoder.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 namespace pwiz {
00032 namespace msdata {
00033 
00034 
00035 /// MSData <-> mzXML stream serialization
00036 class Serializer_mzXML
00037 {
00038     public:
00039 
00040     /// Serializer_mzXML configuration
00041     struct Config
00042     {
00043         /// configuration for binary data encoding in write()
00044         /// note: byteOrder is ignored (mzXML always big endian) 
00045         BinaryDataEncoder::Config binaryDataEncoderConfig;
00046 
00047         /// (indexed==true): read/write with <index>
00048         bool indexed;
00049 
00050         Config() : indexed(true) {}
00051     };
00052 
00053     /// constructor
00054     Serializer_mzXML(const Config& config = Config());
00055 
00056     /// write MSData object to ostream as mzXML
00057     void write(std::ostream& os, const MSData& msd) const;
00058 
00059     /// read in MSData object from an mzXML istream 
00060     /// note: istream may be managed by MSData's SpectrumList, to allow for 
00061     /// lazy evaluation of Spectrum data
00062     void read(boost::shared_ptr<std::istream> is, MSData& msd) const;
00063 
00064     private:
00065     class Impl;
00066     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00067     Serializer_mzXML(Serializer_mzXML&);
00068     Serializer_mzXML& operator=(Serializer_mzXML&);
00069 };
00070 
00071 
00072 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Serializer_mzXML::Config& config);
00073 
00074 
00075 } // namespace msdata
00076 } // namespace pwiz
00077 
00078 
00079 #endif // _SERIALIZER_MZXML_HPP_
